This search engine is recommended to be used based on the following benefits:

li.p: It is very easy to configure as a search engine for the output. You just need to configure Oxygen Feedback for your website and enable the Enable content indexing option in the section.

ul.li: It offers a fast response, even for large documentation projects.
It includes advanced features such as faceted search, semantic search, and labeling content.

section.title: How to Configure Oxygen Feedback as the Search Engine for WebHelp Output
section.p: To configure as an external search engine in Oxygen WebHelp Responsive output:

ol.li: In the administration interface of , go to the Version Settings page for the particular version where you want the engine replaced.
Scroll to the Content Indexing and Search section and click Edit to expand the section.
Select the Enable content indexing option.

section.p: A re-indexing operation is automatically triggered. The Status must be displayed as Ready before the functionality is available in the output. You can click the Check Index Status button to the right of the status to query the OTSS server for the current status.
